name: Nectar
desc: A Wordpress blog for Papyrus that showcases topics revolving around the greeting cards and stationary they offer.

name: Graduation Source
desc: An interactive infographic that serves as a guide for students to learn and decide on their future career path.

name: Unicorn
desc: A slightly opinionated starter kit for any front-end development projects that helps developers write faster and cleaner code.

name: NVIDIA
desc: A simple landing page that showcases the advanced features of NVIDIA's latest 4K HDR streaming media player.

name: Hillel
desc: A landing page encouraging recent graduates to advance their careers by applying for their new fellowship program.

name: Colgate
desc: A social campaign encouraging users to save water and take a pledge to turn off the faucet when you brush your teeth.

name: Grace
desc: An awareness campaign that offers downloadable resources with facts about the current rise of child poverty in Los Angeles.

name: CurioPress
desc: An open-minded Wordpress theme kit with a few useful tools that helps developers jump start any of their Wordpress project.

name: Vulcan
desc: A website showcasing company news and information about the documentaries and educational films that they have worked on.

name: Murchison-Hume
desc: An ecommerce store that provides safe cleaning solutions that only use cruelty free and naturally derived ingredients.

name: Art Brokerage
desc: A platform that helps dealers, galleries, and private collectors to safely and securely manage all of their art transactions.

name: McKesson
desc: A health care distributor portal that bridges the gap between hospitals, healthcare providers, pharmacies and manufacturers

name: PIMCO Indices
desc: A resource for investors to visit and gain some insight on the current years global investment, debt levels, and inflation.

name: PacDental
desc: A portal that offers talent acquisition assistance by connecting experienced dentists with inquiring dental offices.

name: SitOnIt
desc: An ecommerce store that provides high quality and custom built task, conference, and multipurpose chairs.
